request.description: Post request to enter candidate details in database
GET the candidate details using their email ID.

body.raw:
{
    "technology": "Android",
    "difficulty":"Basic",
    "question": "What is Android?",
    "option1": "Object Oriented",
    "option2": "Object Based",
    "option3": "Procedural",
    "option4": "none of the above",
    "answer": "option1"
}

request.description: Admin enters the question, each question has to be unique.
Find the questions entered by Admin by Technology.
To delete the question from DataBase using the Question.
